Articles.Content: I would like to know if any modpack that makes the game more difficult as if it were an RP-1 but in the stock planet system, I played the career mode without mods for a long time but I don't know, the game always remains the same in terms of difficulty I would like mods that leave the game in career mode but without changing the planets like RSS / RP-1.
You could try Kerbalism or combine some realism mods like TAC-LS, Remote Tech, Real Fuels, FAR, Real Heat, Kerbal Health, etc.

On 10/2/2020 at 7:41 AM, MuriloMoreira said:

I would like to know if any modpack that makes the game more difficult as if it were an RP-1 but in the stock planet system

Definitly kerbalism. This affects life support and science collection. 

But it really comes down to what you find harder?  Do you want something a little more challenging or a lot?   And how far down the mod rabbit hole you want to fall.

Perhaps if you introduce a patch that reduces the efficiencies of engines to make it more difficult to get off Kerbin too.  I have a patch for that in the Simplex Tech Tree which you could move if you don't want the tree itself.

Peace
